title: Some basic techniques the lab members might need to know or learn.
content:
-R software. Basic tutorial (https://www.statmethods.net/r-tutorial/index.html). Or python. -data visualization, such as R ‘ggplot’. -Endnote or other reference management software. -Basic statistics: correlation,lm, glm, gam (‘mgcv’), glmm(‘lme4’), gamm(‘mgcv’). Sometimes, maybe structural equation model(R package ‘piecewiseSem’,spss Amos,…) -Network analysis. Some R packages: igraph, bipartite…

to be continued…

C.Y.

title: Some rules in this lab!
content:
-Stay humble and be polite to your colleagues.
-Work hard, no matter how smart you think you are.
-Read many papers and also try your best to publish papers.
-Please consult me before you make important academic decisions.
-I will keep pushing you if you are too lazy, and will remind you to balance work-life if I find you feel stressed.
-Data and codes belong to this lab, and you.
-I do not know everything, so please challenge me when you have doubts.
-Be honest.
-Be cooperative.
-Do not be late for group meetings. If you have a conflict, inform me in advance.
to be continued…

C.Y.
